label: 宇治の院
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A country villa that had apparently belonged to the tale’s Emperor Suzaku.  There is evidence that the historical Emperor Suzaku actually visited such a place.  This one was probably near the north bank of the Uji River, towards the city.[朱雀、宇治][RK]
